Question: GreenWaves Technologies CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
GreenWaves Technologies

Product: GAP9 Application Processor

- Advanced AI processor for hearables and IoT devices
- Ultra-low energy neural network performance
- Active noise cancellation with neural network-based acoustic scene detection
- Immersive 3D sound
- Real-time AI speech enhancement
- Dynamic spatial audio on wireless headphones
- Ultra-low power AI denoiser
- Partnered with Orosound, Algosonix, DeepHearing Corp., and IDUN audio for innovative audio solutions
- Showcased at CES 2024
- Revolutionizing products in the consumer hearables and IoT markets
Summary_cn:
绿波技术

产品：GAP9 应用处理器

- 用于可穿戴设备和物联网设备的先进AI处理器
- 超低能耗神经网络性能
- 基于神经网络的声场检测的主动降噪功能
- 沉浸式3D音效
- 实时AI语音增强
- 无线耳机的动态空间音频
- 超低功耗AI降噪器
- 与Orosound、Algosonix、DeepHearing Corp.和IDUN audio合作，提供创新的音频解决方案
- 在2024年CES展会上展出
- 革命性地改变消费类可穿戴设备和物联网市场的产品
